name: Intellect Devourer
description: The Intellect Devourer is a small creature with a cunning appearance, characterized by its ability to manipulate and control others. It has a unique ability to devour brains and possess humanoids.
memorable: Its Body Thief ability allows it to take control of other creatures by consuming their brains, making it a deadly psychological threat.
goals: To manipulate and control other creatures, often targeting their minds directly in combat.
relations: Often has connections to other aberrant creatures and might serve more powerful entities in its manipulative schemes.
environment: Can typically be found lurking in dark, secluded places where it can ambush unsuspecting creatures.
strengths: Possesses high Dexterity for evasion and effective mental manipulation abilities that can incapacitate enemies.
weaknesses: Very low physical statistics make it vulnerable to direct physical confrontation and it lacks significant melee capabilities.
attacks: Uses Claws to deal slashing damage and the Ego Whip to inflict psychic damage while potentially stunning targets.
most_powerful_ability: The Body Thief ability allows it to take control of incapacitated humanoids, effectively making it a puppet master.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in complete darkness.
skills: Has proficiency in deception and stealth, showcasing its adeptness at manipulation and remaining unnoticed.
additional_information: Effectively uses its high Intelligence to strategize in combat.
Can control its possessed target while retaining its own mental attributes.
Thrives in ambush scenarios, attacking the mind before the body.
Low Strength makes it physically weak but mentally formidable.

creature that devours brains and takes control
tiny monster with blindsight and brain abilities
cunning aberration lurking in the shadows
